parameters.name: ChannelGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the channel group containing the channel from which the harvest job is running.

parameters.name: ChannelName
parameters.description: The name of the channel from which the harvest job is running.

parameters.name: OriginEndpointName
parameters.description: The name of the origin endpoint that the harvest job is harvesting from. This cannot be changed after the harvest job is submitted.

parameters.name: HarvestJobName
parameters.description: The name of the harvest job to cancel. This name must be unique within the channel and cannot be changed after the harvest job is submitted.
